li.label: killed the metroid queen
li.description: I killed the one - and only - metroid queen on the planet!

li.label: a metroid fed on me!
li.description: That flying... THING violated my very soul, and drained my will to live. I pray it does not happen again...

li.label: metroid food source
li.description: Prisoners are generally kept for ransom or labor. But now, I am little more than cattle for the flying leeches they keep here.
